message.body: Hey i need you to check with housing on monday. what is your housing supposed to cost?
Ok... I don't know how much. Why?

I am working on brynns stuff and notiiced that amount is more than last year by 1700 plus. i thought it was supposed to be less with more students in the apartment style....... Your fafsa is done. Snowing here.... Bad.... 2o car pile up west of columbia city and 1 69 closed north od fort wayne..
Hey should i submit an application to college board for scholarship at nyu? i am working on this for brynn as american university requires it. i see nyu on the list...
Yeah it's almost double last years, it goes up every year but this is the cheapest upperclassmen dorm available. We didn't have a kitchen or air conditioning last year... For me or Brynn?
For you or brynn what?
The college board scholarship
I am working on it for brynn but wondering if i should try nyu too?
I guess
Hey jenna i sent an e mail to you at your g mail account. please take a look and let me know what changes to make if any. i am limited to 2000 words. Thx
I guess that's it
What is it?
The thing you just emailed me.
How does it sound ? does it flow ok?
It's fine... What's your goal though? Like what's it for? That could be cleared up.
it is for the college board with brynns filings. i may do one for nyu too. a section asks for goal is to get some scholarship and grant money to help. what do you mean it could be cleared up?
Like right now it's just like "woe is me" and you could say something like we're doing the best we can, but still need financial assistance to pursue higher education . Ja feel?
So it sounds like woe is me? Is that a good thing? i like your idea doing the best we can...
Not when its a scholarship usually. They don't care if you're poor. They care if you're poor with a purpose.
Ok i will reword it and send to you later....got to go get ink for printer
Jen i just sent an updated e mail. pleSe let me know what u think thx
Good, instead of *is appreciated maybe say "would make a significant impact" or "would open the door for future opportunity for our family"
Ok sent you an updated version.....
Looks good.
Thank you jenna bird.... Snow on the way to you? it was brutal here today...
